content: this color block super scarf is a great scarf for both men and women the simple but mighty texture is beautiful yet gender neutral enough to work for both genders this pattern is for a super scarf meaning this scarf is wider and longer than your standard crochet scarf wrap yourself in this huge scarf and stay warm this winter the pattern does include instructions on how to alter the size to be bigger or smaller by purchasing this pattern you will receive 1 two pdf versions computer friendly with pictures & photo tutorial and printer friendly only one picture 2 instructions on how to alter the size you will need to know how to chain single_crochet and double_crochet this crochet pattern difficulty is advanced beginner beginners can make this scarf but as it is quite large you will need a little endurance to get through it finished crochet super scarf size approximately 9 inches wide x 90 inches long with fringe make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love i m @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet i hope you love this color block super scarf as much as i do happy crocheting the loophole fox |copyright and permissions| this pattern is for personal use only please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose in whole or in part please do not re-publish this pattern or it s photos as your own you may sell items you personally have made from this pattern i just ask that you give credit to me and link to my blog when applicable
